import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const About = () => { return (
{/* Hero Banner */}
About BPR NextGen Solutions Empowering businesses with future-ready digital solutions to scale, adapt, and lead.
{/* Who We Are */}

Who We Are

BPR NextGen Solutions is a next-generation technology company helping businesses thrive in a digitally evolving world.

We design intelligent, scalable solutions that drive transformation, boost efficiency, and fuel growth.

With a team of passionate innovators, we bring deep industry insight, technical expertise, and a relentless drive to deliver impact.

{/* Vision & Mission */}

🌍 Vision

To be a global leader in delivering intelligent, future-ready digital solutions that transform how businesses operate, innovate, and grow.

🚀 Mission

To empower organizations with cutting-edge technology, scalable platforms, and expert consulting that drive sustainable growth, operational excellence, and digital resilience.

{/* Core Values */}

What We Stand For

{[ { title: "Innovation", desc: "We stay ahead with tech that transforms." }, { title: "Integrity", desc: "We build trust through transparency and ethics." }, { title: "Collaboration", desc: "We grow with strong, meaningful partnerships." }, { title: "Excellence", desc: "We deliver quality at every step." }, ].map((value, idx) => (

{value.title}

{value.desc}

))}
); }; export default About;
